actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide disability insurance benefits thereunder for any individual who is blind and has at least six quarters of coverage, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance), disability insurance benefits for any individual who is blind and has at least six quarters of coverage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide disability insurance benefits thereunder for any individual who is blind and has at least six quarters of coverage, and for other purposes.
